abstract: Valero is acquiring Chevron’s refinery in Pembroke, Wales, for $730 million and other related assets for about $1 billion.
snippet: Valero is acquiring Chevron’s refinery in Pembroke, Wales, for $730 million and other related assets for about $1 billion.
lead_paragraph: Valero Energy agreed on Friday to buy Chevron‘s refinery in Pembroke, Wales, for $730 million and other related assets for about $1 billion.

headline.main: Valero to Buy Chevron British Refinery and Assets

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
